metadata.dc:subject: RICKETTSIA PROWAZEKII
TYPHUS/immunology
VACCINES
metadata.dc:title: [Immunization of man against typhus epidemics by injections of avirulent Rickettsia prowazeki (CEPAE). Brief analysis with observations during a period of 3 years and averages as to the occurrence of typhus between vaccinated individuals and the control population in the zone on the Andes Peruanos. (Distrito de Ilave, Departamento de Puno)].
